Helping Injury Victims Recover From Spinal Cord Injuries

The spinal cord is one of the most essential elements of the nervous system. It is the conduit that carries communications such as touch between the brain and the rest of the body.

Damage to the spinal cord is often permanent. Paralysis can occur when there is a disruption in the spinal cord’s ability to transmit nerve impulses.

Common Ways Spinal Cord Injuries Occur

Spinal cord injuries can result from a variety of accidents, including:

  • Motor vehicle accidents that result in damage to the back or neck area
  • Medical malpractice involving failed spinal taps and improper pain management injections
  • Workplace accidents involving falls from scaffolds or contact with heavy construction equipment

Unfortunately, in many of these instances, the injury could have been prevented.

If you or a loved one suffered a spinal cord injury and you believe it was caused by the negligence of another, turning to a lawyer with expertise in this field is imperative to getting compensation.

Confidence In Our Team

At Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, our Columbus, Ohio, attorneys have the skill and expertise to help you recover.

We have been handling these types of cases since 1968 and, with decades of combined experience, we are confident that our skilled team of lawyers can help secure the medical care and financial support needed to punish the wrongdoer and confront the impact of your spinal cord injury.

Contact Us To Find Out How We Can Help

We invite you to call or send our firm an email to schedule a free consultation. Call 614-360-2706 today. We collect attorneys’ fees only if we recover compensation for you.

We can discuss your injury, the law, our past recoveries, and legal recourse options available.
